name: Thrill Drive
overview:
Thrill Drive was produced by Konami in 1999.

A driving game where you try to reach your goal in the fastest time without accidents.

First, choose your vehicle: a sedan, a station wagon, or a truck. Then select a course and race through the roads of Japan, The United States, or Europe. Drive through city streets, highways, and winding country roads. Race to reach checkpoints and earn bonus time. Avoid pedestrians and obstacles that suddenly appear. Accidents will cause you to lose time and have your ratings go down. You must also look out for cops and speed traps. After the game, your driving skills are analyzed and displayed. Your driving is evaluated on your reflexes, desire, style, courage, manners and IQ.
